WorkItem.Description:
Hi,
 
when I tried the example provide "07reader.xlsx" an issue occured :
 
10:14:03 Load from Excel2007 file 
Warning: ZipArchive::getFromName() [function.ZipArchive-getFromName]: Invalid or unitialized Zip object in C:\Program Files\xampp\htdocs\phpexcel\Classes\PHPExcel\Reader\Excel2007.php on line 86
 
Warning: Invalid argument supplied for foreach() in C:\Program Files\xampp\htdocs\phpexcel\Classes\PHPExcel\Reader\Excel2007.php on line 87
10:14:03 Write to Excel2007 format 10:14:03 Done writing files. 
 
Could you help me please ?
Is there any possibility to read an 2003 xls file ?
 
Regards.
C. Verhaest

Comments.Message:

2. XLS reader is under development, check http://www.codeplex.com/PHPExcel/WorkItem/View.aspx?WorkItemId=2841
